title: Useful Value Proposition Examples (and How to Create a Good One)
author: Tom Wessling
description: A value proposition is the #1 thing that determines whether people will bother reading more about your product or hit the back button. It’s also the main thing you need to test – if you get it right, it will be a huge boost.
